title: James Wan Comments On The Possibility Of Aqualad Appearing In Aquaman
text:
James Wan Comments On The Possibility Of Aqualad Appearing In Aquaman Charlie Ridgely Back to Article Image of 
With Aquaman beginning production soon, fans are starting to realize just how big of a world James Wan will be exploring in the film. 
The cast continues to grow, proving that a ton of classic Aquaman characters will make themselves known. Mera, Orm, Black Manta, Vulko, and Atlanna are all confirmed to appear alongside Arthur Curry in the movie. 
That's a pretty long list, and there's surely more to come. However, if you're a fan of Young Justice or Teen Titans , there's one glaring omission to the cast. 
What about Aqualad? 
Many have been asking if the famous sidekick will appear in Aquaman . Finally, on Twitter, director James Wan shut down those rumors once and for all. 
Absolutely not at all. But thanks for asking. https://t.co/THEIDZG1n8 — James Wan (@creepypuppet) February 20, 2017 
After Wan was pretty definitive about the character not showing up in the film, some fans stated that their hearts were being broken. This gave Wan an opportunity to explain why he chose not to include Aqualad in the movie, and his answer makes a ton of sense. 
How about we get Batman established properly first, before we cram in Robin. https://t.co/RlX3YiWelB — James Wan (@creepypuppet) February 20, 2017 
Aquaman is set to hit theaters in 2018, but he will first appear in this year's Justice League film. 
Let us know how pumped you are about Justice League below with our anticipation rankings! Right now, it’s the third-most anticipated movie on all of ComicBook.com! 
In Justice League, fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman’s selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to find and recruit a team of metahumans to stand against this newly awakened threat. But despite the formation of this unprecedented league of heroes—Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and The Flash—it may already be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions. 
Justice League is directed by Zack Snyder, from a screenplay by Chris Terrio, and features an ensemble cast that includes Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot, Ezra Miller, Jason Momoa , Ray Fisher, Ciarán Hinds, Amy Adams, Diane Lane, Jeremy Irons and Jesse Eisenberg.
